title: Robert Ferguson Personal Site
description: A portfolio site for Robert Ferguson, front-end developer and artist

arduino-web-controller.name: Arduino Web Controller
arduino-web-controller.description: I want to control hardware through a web interface.

branches.name: branches
branches.description: Randomly generated artwork created in Processing. Processing takes an SVG file with tiles inside and arranges them on a grid in random order so the white curves connect from tile to tile. For the most part.

budget-tracker.name: Budget Tracker
budget-tracker.description: A mobile application used to track expenses. Built in AngularJS with a Firebase backend.

drawing-game.name: Drawing Game
drawing-game.description: A mobile game where you are presented with parts of a design, and you use drawing tools to complete the image.

dynamicat.name: DynamiCat
dynamicat.description: A script in Processing to dynamically create cat faces based on hand drawn components.

flipdraw.name: Flip Draw
flipdraw.description: Simple two player drawing and guessing game using JavaScript.  One player has a blank drawing canvas and the other player has scrambled letter tiles.  As the first player draws the second player guesses the drawing by assembling the tiles.

frame-squeezer.name: Frame Squeezer
frame-squeezer.description: I really liked the movie barcode images on Tumblr, and I’ve been trying to figure out a way to approximate that type of image using Processing.

laptop-stand.name: Laptop Stand
laptop-stand.description: I want my own laptop stand for my desk

maze-game.name: Maze Game
maze-game.description: A simple maze game for mobile that uses the accelerometer to move the player.

midi-controller.name: Midi Controller
midi-controller.description: Some controls in Logic are just easier if you have a physical knob or control to manipulate. Assigning them is pretty easy in the software, I just need to create some knobs to assign. Arduino can output this info in MIDI.

octopus.name: Octopus
octopus.description: I’m trying to script a looping animation for octopus tentacle(s).

photo-scramble.name: Photo Scramble
photo-scramble.description: A basic photo scramble game. I wanted to design a project in javascript that I could then wrap in PhoneGap and try to access the camera roll to play a game.

projector.name: Projector
projector.description: a diy method of projecting images from my computer

quadcopter.name: Quadcopter
quadcopter.description: I'm trying to build a quadcopter, and learning about each piece as I go.

raspberry-pi-bluetooth-audio-receiver.name: Raspberry Pi Bluetooth Audio Receiver
raspberry-pi-bluetooth-audio-receiver.description: A Raspberry Pi, with a Bluetooth adapter can receive audio from a variety of sources and output the signal through its built-in audio outputs. Any audio device with an aux jack could potentially receive a wireless Bluetooth audio signal.

raspberry-pi-video-camera.name: Raspberry Pi Video Camera
raspberry-pi-video-camera.description: I used to have a pretty big collection of vintage cameras, although its quite a bit smaller these days. I purchased a really cool Canon super 8 camera with sound the other day and I’ve been trying to figure out to breathe new life into it. I imagined that if I could find a way to modify the Raspberry Pi camera module and fit it inside the case, there would be enough room inside the film compartment for the rest of the Raspberry Pi’s electronics. I’d have a Raspberry Pi powered camera inside a cool vintage super 8 case.

timer.name: Timer
timer.description: A simple animated timer application written in JavaScript, SVG and the Electron framework.

todoredo.name: TodoRedo
todoredo.description: A simple todo list built in React and Firebase. I’ve never made one, so I wanted to try one as a test. The only aspect of this app that I haven’t seen anywhere else is I wanted a daily list that would reset itself each day. I have items that I would like to check off each day, and the next morning be presented with a fresh list.

udacity-arcade-game-project.name: Udacity Arcade Game Project
udacity-arcade-game-project.description: Project 4 for the Udacity Front End Developer Nanodegree program.

udacity-neighborhood-map-project.name: Udacity Neighborhood Map Project
udacity-neighborhood-map-project.description: Project 5 for the Udacity Front End Developer Nanodegree program.

untitled-water-drop-game.name: Untitled Water Drop Game
untitled-water-drop-game.description: A mobile game where the main character is a drop of water. Physical properties like surface tension apply. Enemies are evaporative elements like sun, fires, etc.

weather-lamp.name: Weather Lamp
weather-lamp.description: I picked an office with no windows, so I’m stuck with artificial light only while I work. I’d like some ambient light provided with RGB LEDs that change their color temperature based on the local weather outside. I’m sure there are lamps that do this, but I would like the light more integrated into my work area. Not one single spot of colored light, but an overall ambient glow. I figure to get this effect I would have to build something myself.

hangman.name: Hangman
hangman.description: An online version of the hangman game with user authentication, single player and real time multiplayer capabilities.

franktank.name: The Frank Tank
franktank.description: YouTube player application that curates sports videos and allows users to comment on and favorite time based segments.

sounddeck.name: SoundDeck
sounddeck.description: A community dj app based on the soundcloud api allowing users to enter rooms, curate playlists, and vote on the best tracks.
